short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play watermelon merge Games right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!
short.da: Spil merge watermelon Game lige nu. Oplev glæden ved at spille dette spil - din ultimative online glade oplevelse! Prøv det nu!
short.el: Παίξτε το παιχνίδι συγχώνευσης καρπούζι τώρα. Ανακαλύψτε τη χαρά να παίζετε αυτό το παιχνίδι - Η απόλυτη διαδικτυακή σας…
short.es: Juega al juego de fusionar sandía ahora mismo. Descubre la alegría de jugar este juego: ¡tu mejor experiencia feliz en línea!…
short.et: Mängige arbuusi ühendamise mängu kohe. Avastage selle mängu mängimise rõõm – teie ülim õnnelik veebikogemus! Proovi seda kohe!
short.ja: 今すぐマージ スイカ ゲームをプレイしてください。このゲームでプレイする喜びを発見してください - 究極のオンライン ハッピー エクスペリエンス!やってみよう！
short.ko: 지금 바로 수박 병합 게임을 즐겨보세요. 이 게임의 즐거움을 발견해보세요 - 최고의 온라인 행복한 경험을 즐겨보세요! 지금 사용해 보세요!
short.nl: Speel nu het merge-watermeloenspel. Ontdek het plezier van het spelen van dit spel: jouw ultieme online gelukkige ervaring! Probeer…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction
The Watermelon Game takes the simple concept of merging fruits and turns it into an exciting and challenging gameplay experience. In this game, you'll be presented with a variety of delicious fruits that you can merge to create bigger and better ones. The goal? To achieve the legendary watermelon fusion and reach the highest score possible!

Gameplay
The gameplay of Watermelon Game is easy to learn but hard to master. Here's how it works:

Merge Fruits: Start by dragging and combining two identical fruits to create a larger fruit. For example, merging two small strawberries will result in a medium-sized apple. Merge again to create an even larger fruit. Keep merging to reach the ultimate goal: a mouth-watering watermelon!

Strategic Moves: Plan your moves wisely to optimize your fruit merging strategy. Think ahead and consider the possible outcomes of each merge. Sometimes it's better to wait for more identical fruits to appear before making a move to achieve a higher-level fusion.

Challenge Levels: Watermelon Fusion offers a series of challenging levels with specific objectives. Complete these levels by reaching target fruit sizes or achieving a certain number of mergers. As you progress, the levels become more difficult, putting your merging skills to the test.
